dependencies.description: Dinosaur: differentiable dynamics for global atmospheric modeling.
dependencies.name: py-dinosaur

dependencies.description:
Gin provides a lightweight configuration framework for Python, based on
dependency injection.
dependencies.name: py-gin-config

dependencies.description:
Differentiate, compile, and transform Numpy code. JAX is a Python
library for accelerator-oriented array computation and program
transformation, designed for high-performance numerical computing and
large-scale machine learning.
dependencies.name: py-jax

dependencies.description:
XLA library for Jax. jaxlib is the support library for JAX. While JAX
itself is a pure Python package, jaxlib contains the binary (C/C++)
parts of the library, including Python bindings, the XLA compiler, the
PJRT runtime, and a handful of handwritten kernels.
dependencies.name: py-jaxlib

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: A gradient processing and optimisation library in JAX.
dependencies.name: py-optax

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
TensorFlow Probability (TFP) is a Python library built on TensorFlow
that makes it easy to combine probabilistic models and deep learning on
modern hardware (TPU, GPU). It's for data scientists, statisticians, ML
researchers, and practitioners who want to encode domain knowledge to
understand data and make predictions.
dependencies.name: py-tensorflow-probability

dependencies.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python
dependencies.name: py-xarray

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description: NeuralGCM: Hybrid ML + Physics model of Earth's atmosphere.
name: py-neuralgcm

variants.name: build_system
